The photographs circulating in mid: February 2021 showing the pack of stray dogs that had been discolored blue.
Confirmation from Rosprirodnadzor: a branch of the federal service for the Supervision of Natural Resources in the region of Nizhny Nogorod, about the incident and their launch of an investigation to determine the cause of the discoloration.
The examination of the dogs at the veter: where veterinarians reportedly stated that the canines did not show any serious health effects.
The possibility of exposure to copper su: an inorganic compound with sulfur and copper, which is a popular pesticide known to cause irritation and potential harm to humans.
